jobDescription: IFTTT is, at its core, a platform for data exchange. We collect petabytes of data on the usage of our products. The mission of the data team is to help internal teams make data-informed decisions, help users get more value out of IFTTT, and productize the data from users and partners to grow the IFTTT ecosystem. What you will do: Work closely with product and engineering to define, instrument, and measure product performanceUnderstand complex data and communicate those understandings clearlyOwn the data used in product decisions, support the team in development of new products and improvement of existing productsProvide a critical voice in how products are evaluated, ensure that the product team has good data to understand the performance of products, analyze experiment results and learn from themParticipate as an active member of the Data team to improve the quality and availability of data provided to the rest of the company and to partnersExplore and advocate for ways to use data to make IFTTT a better product Key qualifications We are looking for: Strong statistical background, masters or above in Math, Statistics, Computer Science, or a similar field.Fluent in tools such as Hive/Redshift/BigQuery, Python, Spark, and Pandas/RExperience in product analytics and modeling using production dataExperience working closely with product team to evaluate performance of products and featuresExperience creating and working with data products used in production
